title: Occupational Hazards
description:
Grace Helbig, Tim Lopez and Justin Willman share stories about getting drunk while working at a wedding, flailing at “flair bartending,” and watching a magician’s dove disappear for real.

 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Grace Helbig, Tim Lopez, Kevin Allison, Justin Willman, The Rolling Stones, Giggle Feed, Flash Gordon, The Princess Bride, Madness, Adi Goldstein)
